description: After HOTEL CAZZO, with its northern Italian atmosphere, a rougher Cazzo film was once again due, in good old Cazzo style, with raw sex and rugged locations. So off we go to Ebers Forest in Brandenburg, to the old factory grounds where AUTHENTIC ADVENTURES and KOMMANDO X were shot. And what could be more appropriate than inviting back Cazzo's biggest star, Thom Barron!Added to Thom's and Eduardo Cortez's (Thom's willing victim) attractions, is a forklift that comes into play and guarantees that this scene won't be forgotten soon!
title: Sex Pigs : Eduardo Cortez, Thom Barron
